channel.title: How do i change the xp the door,dummy or hay gives?
channel.description:
On my server people are getting xp to fast, how do i change what xp the door, dummy and hay gives?
Thanks. :D

item.title: How do i change the xp the door,dummy or hay gives?
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Well for example search

dummy

Youll see something like this

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Hit The Dummy. And gain some xp."); setAnimation(2890); addSkillXP((1800*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((900*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((450*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 29; } break;

Change the

addSkillXP(([red]1800[/red]*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP(([red]900[/red]*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP(([red]450[/red]*playerLevel[18]), 18);

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the xp the door,dummy or hay gives?
